summary: Turk, a "cool swinger", throws and wild sex and drugs party, but has trouble when three hoodlum friends of his crash the party and Turk resorts to drastic measures to remove them from the festivities.
cast: Richard Howell|Ed Sansone|Lee Parker|Joel Bently|Ann Brandt|Bo Barten|Cherie Winters|Janet Banzet|Alex Mann|Natara
title: Smoke and Flesh
